task.name: v.clean
task.description: Herramientas para limpiar la topología de mapas vectoriales.

parameter.name: input
parameter.description: Nombre del mapa vectorial de entrada.

parameter.name: output
parameter.description: Nombre para el mapa vectorial de salida.

parameter.name: error
parameter.description: Nombre del mapa de salida donde se escriben los errores

value.name: snap
value.description: snap lines to vertex in threshold

value.name: chdangle
value.description: change the type of boundary dangle to line, threshold ignored if < 0, input line type is ignored

value.name: rmbridge
value.description: remove bridges connecting area and island or 2 islands

value.name: chbridge
value.description: change the type of bridges connecting area and island or 2 islands from boundary to line

value.name: rmdupl
value.description: remove duplicate geometry features (pay attention to categories!)

value.name: rmdac
value.description: remove duplicate area centroids ('type' option ignored)

value.name: bpol
value.description: break (topologically clean) polygons (imported from non topological format, like ShapeFile). Boundaries are broken on each point shared between 2 and more polygons where angles of segments are different

value.name: prune
value.description: remove vertices in threshold from lines and boundaries, boundary is pruned only if topology is not damaged (new intersection, changed attachement of centroid), first and last segment of the boundary is never changed

value.name: rmarea
value.description: remove small areas, the longest boundary with adjacent area is removed

value.name: rmline
value.description: remove all lines or boundaries of zero length, threshold is ignored

value.name: rmsa
value.description: remove small angles between lines at nodes

parameter.name: thresh
parameter.label: Threshold
parameter.description: Umbral en unidades de mapa, un valor para cada herramienta (por omisión: 0.0[,0.0,...])

flag.name: b
flag.description: No construir la topología para el vectorial de salida

flag.name: overwrite
flag.description: Permite a los archivos de salida sobrescribir los archivos existentes.
